channel.title: Need a good coder Aura PRoject! [pi]
channel.description:
i got this project in mind but i just need someone to help me thru one step of the proccess...
[IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/ganter2/Untitled-4.jpg[/img]
not sure how to move it up there but if some knows how could you please explain me how to do it, Thanks.

item.title: Need a good coder Aura PRoject! [pi]
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

[quote=“matzie, post:6, topic:441417”][quote author=DannyIsSoPro link=topic=544113.msg3989448#msg3989448 date=1336353801]
WHAT THE…LOL!

I can see this going far for some reason LMFAO.
[/quote]

it really takes a good coder to figure this one out, right? >_>[/quote]

I was being sarcastic lmao about the whole going far thing lol, but yeah. The aura equip problem shouldn’t be a hassle.

PS: Sounds like you’re being sarcastic too haha.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a good coder Aura PRoject! [pi]
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

There is something in your server that determines what slot stuff is equipped to. You should have one for auras, use that one (i think it is either 1 or 0, because of how it is set up, unless PI is completely different) Default slot items are equipped to are weapons, "if (itemID==itemsid…) equipcrap=auraSlot… lol

Read full topic
